00029 
00030 bool k_DrawHistogram(TImage *pSource, TImage *pDest)
00031 { 
00032         if ((pSource->Origin==EMPTY) || (pSource==pDest) || (pSource->Bits==1))
00033         {
00034                 TString str;
00035                 k_InitString(&str);
00036                 k_AddFileAndLine(str);
00037                 if (pSource->Origin==EMPTY)
00038                         k_ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,&str,"k_DrawHistogram() Source image is empty");
00039                 else if (pSource==pDest)
00040                         k_ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,&str,"k_DrawHistogram() Source and destination image cannot be the same");
00041                 else
00042                         k_ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,&str,"k_DrawHistogram() Source has 1 b/p");
00043 
00044                 k_EmptyString(&str);
00045                 return false;
00046         }
00047         else
00048         {
00049                 float buf;
00050                 unsigned int x,y;
00051                 TStatistic Stat;
00052                 k_InitStatistic(&Stat);
00053                 k_EmptyImage(pDest);
00054                 k_AllocImage(277,320,1,pDest);
00055 #ifdef IPL_ADD_HISTORY
00056                 /* copy history before adding comment */
00057                 k_CopyText(&(pDest->History),&(pSource->History));
00058                 /* add comment to history */
00059                 {
00060                         TString History;
00061                         k_InitString(&History);
00062                         k_SprintfString(&History,"%sk_DrawHistogram() Drawn from image with file info: %s",
00063                                 ipl_HistoryIndent,pSource->FileInfo.PathAndFileName);
00064                         k_AppendTextIPL(&(pDest->History),History.pChars);
00065                         k_EmptyString(&History);
00066                         k_IplStartHistoryMacro();
00067                 }
00068 #endif
00069                 k_FlushImage(1,pDest);
00070                 for (x=10;x<267;x++)
00071                 {
00072                         k_SetPixel1bp(x,10,0,*pDest);
00073                         k_SetPixel1bp(x,310,0,*pDest);
00074                 }
00075                 for (y=10;y<310;y++)
00076                 {
00077                         k_SetPixel1bp(10,y,0,*pDest);
00078                         k_SetPixel1bp(267,y,0,*pDest);
00079                 }
00080                 k_DeriveImageStats(&Stat,pSource);
00081                 buf=0;
00082                 for (x=0;x<Stat.SizeOfHistogram;x++)
00083                 {
00084                         if ((float)Stat.pHistogram[x]>buf)
00085                                 buf=(float)Stat.pHistogram[x];
00086                 }
00087                 for (x=0;x<Stat.SizeOfHistogram;x++)
00088                 {
00089                         for (y=0;y<(unsigned int)(300.0*((float)Stat.pHistogram[x])/buf);y++)
00090                         {
00091                                 k_SetPixel1bp(x+11,310-y,0,*pDest);
00092                         }
00093                 }
00094 #ifdef IPL_ADD_HISTORY
00095                 /* end history appending (remove a leading '\t' character) */
00096                 k_IplStopHistoryMacro();
00097 #endif
00098                 k_EmptyStatistic(&Stat);
00099                 return true;
00100         }
00101 }
00102 
00103 bool k_EqualizeHistogram(TImage *pSource,TImage *pDest)
00104 {
00105         if ((pSource->Origin==EMPTY) || (pSource->Bits<8))
00106         {
00107                 TString str;
00108                 k_InitString(&str);
00109                 k_AddFileAndLine(str);
00110                 k_ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,&str,"k_EqualizeHistogram() Source image is empty or image is not 8 or 24 b/p");
00111                 k_EmptyString(&str);
00112                 return false;
00113         } 
00114         else
00115         {
00116                 TImage* pTarget=pDest;
00117                 bool CopyToSource=false;
00118                 unsigned long int Histogram[256];
00119                 unsigned short LUT[256];
00120                 unsigned long int sum;
00121                 int i,x,y,w,h;
00122                 UINT32 PalValue;
00123                 float buf;
00124                 /* Check if the source and destination is the same image */
00125                 if (pDest==pSource)
00126                 {
00127                         pTarget=(TImage*) malloc(sizeof(TImage));
00128                         k_InitImage(pTarget);
00129                         CopyToSource=true;
00130                 }
00131                 for (i=0;i<256;i++) 
00132                         Histogram[i]=0;
00133                 w=pSource->Width;
00134                 h=pSource->Height;
00135                 if (pSource->Bits==8)
00136                 {
00137                         for (y=0;y<h;y++)
00138                         {
00139                                 for (x=0;x<w;x++) 
00140                                 {
00141                                         Histogram[k_GetPixel8bp(x,y,*pSource)]++;
00142                                 }
00143                         }
00144                 }
00145                 else
00146                 {
00147                         for (y=0;y<h;y++)
00148                         {
00149                                 for (x=0;x<w;x++) 
00150                                 {
00151                                         PalValue=k_GetPixel24bp(x,y,*pSource);
00152                                         Histogram[(UINT8)((int)((k_PalGetRVal(PalValue)+
00153                                                 k_PalGetGVal(PalValue)+k_PalGetBVal(PalValue))/3+0.5))]++;
00154                                 }
00155                         }
00156                 }
00157                 k_EmptyImage(pTarget);
00158                 sum=Histogram[0];
00159                 LUT[0]=0;
00160                 for (i=1;i<255;i++)
00161                 {
00162                         sum+=Histogram[i];
00163                         LUT[i]=(int)(255.0*sum/w/h+0.5);
00164                 }
00165                 LUT[255]=255;
00166                 if (pSource->Bits==8)
00167                 {
00168                         k_AllocImage(w,h,8,pTarget);
00169                         for (y=0;y<h;y++)
00170                                 for (x=0;x<w;x++) 
00171                                         k_SetPixel8bp(x,y,LUT[k_GetPixel8bp(x,y,*pSource)],*pTarget);
00172                 }
00173                 else
00174                 {
00175                         int r,g,b;
00176                         k_AllocImage(w,h,24,pTarget);
00177                         for (y=0;y<h;y++)
00178                         {
00179                                 for (x=0;x<w;x++) 
00180                                 { 
00181                                         PalValue=k_GetPixel24bp(x,y,*pSource);
00182                                         i=((int)((k_PalGetRVal(PalValue)+
00183                                                 k_PalGetGVal(PalValue)+k_PalGetBVal(PalValue))/3+0.5));
00184                                         if (i==0) 
00185                                                 buf=0; 
00186                                         else 
00187                                                 buf=(float)(LUT[i])/(float)(i);
00188                                         
00189                                         r=(int)(buf*k_PalGetRVal(PalValue));
00190                                         if (r>255) 
00191                                                 r=255;
00192                                         g=(int) (buf*k_PalGetGVal(PalValue));
00193                                         if (g>255)
00194                                                 g=255;
00195                                         b=(int)(buf*k_PalGetBVal(PalValue));
00196                                         if (b>255) 
00197                                                 b=255;
00198                                         k_SetPixel24bp(x,y,k_PalCreateRGB(r,g,b),*pTarget);
00199                                 }
00200                         }
00201                 }
00202 #ifdef IPL_ADD_HISTORY
00203                 /* copy history before adding comment */
00204                 k_CopyText(&(pTarget->History),&(pSource->History));
00205                 /* add comment to history */
00206                 {
00207                         TString History;
00208                         k_InitString(&History);
00209                         k_SprintfString(&History,"%sk_EqualizeHistogram()",ipl_HistoryIndent);
00210                         k_AppendTextIPL(&(pTarget->History),History.pChars);
00211                         k_EmptyString(&History);
00212                         k_IplStartHistoryMacro();
00213                 }
00214 #endif
00215                 if (CopyToSource==true)
00216                 {
00217                         k_CopyImage(pDest,pTarget);
00218                         k_EmptyImage(pTarget);
00219                         free(pTarget);
00220                 }
00221 #ifdef IPL_ADD_HISTORY
00222                 /* end history appending (remove a leading '\t' character) */
00223                 k_IplStopHistoryMacro();
00224 #endif
00225                 return true;
00226         }
00227 }
00228 
00229 bool k_NonlinearCopyByteToByte(TImage *pSource,float gamma,
00230                                                            int Min,int Max, TImage *pDest)
00231 {
00232         if (pSource->Bits!=8)
00233         {
00234                 TString str;
00235                 k_InitString(&str);
00236                 k_AddFileAndLine(str);
00237                 k_ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,&str,"k_NonLinearByteToByte(). Source image does not have 8 b/p");
00238                 k_EmptyString(&str);
00239                 return false;
00240         }
00241         else if ((pSource->Origin==EMPTY) || (Max<=Min) || (gamma<0))
00242         {
00243                 TString str;
00244                 k_InitString(&str);
00245                 k_AddFileAndLine(str);
00246                 k_ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,&str,"k_NonLinearCopyByteToByte(). Source image is empty or wrong"
00247                         " input data: gamma= %f, Min = %d, Max = %d", gamma, Min,Max);
00248                 k_EmptyString(&str);
00249                 return false;
00250         }
00251         else
00252         { 
00253                 unsigned int x,y,w,h;
00254                 double p,q,den,logden;
00255                 den=Max-Min;
00256                 logden=log(den+1);
00257                 h=pSource->Height;
00258                 w=pSource->Width;
00259                 if ((pDest->Width!=w) || (pDest->Height!=h) || (pDest->Bits!=8))
00260                 {
00261                         k_AllocImage(w,h,8,pDest);
00262                 }
00263 #ifdef IPL_ADD_HISTORY
00264                 if (pDest!=pSource)
00265                 {
00266                         /* make sure to delete history in pDest! */
00267                         k_EmptyText(&(pDest->History));
00268                         /* copy history before adding comment */
00269                         k_CopyText(&(pDest->History),&(pSource->History));
00270                 }
00271                 /* add comment to history */
00272                 {
00273                         TString History;
00274                         k_InitString(&History);
00275                         k_SprintfString(&History,"%sk_NonLinearByteToByte() gamma=%f, Min=%d, Max=%d",
00276                                 ipl_HistoryIndent,gamma,Min,Max);
00277                         k_AppendTextIPL(&(pDest->History),History.pChars);
00278                         k_EmptyString(&History);
00279                         k_IplStartHistoryMacro();
00280                 }
00281 #endif
00282                 for (y=0;y<h;y++)
00283                 {
00284                         for (x=0;x<w;x++) 
00285                         { 
00286                                 q=(float)pSource->ppMatrix[y][x];
00287                                 if (q<=Min)
00288                                         p=0; 
00289                                 else
00290                                 {
00291                                         if (gamma==(float)1)
00292                                                 p=(q-Min)/den;
00293                                         else if (gamma==(float)0)
00294                                                 p=log(q-Min+1)/logden; 
00295                                         else
00296                                                 p=pow((double)(q-Min)/den,(double)gamma);
00297                                         if (p>1)
00298                                                 p=1;
00299                                 }
00300                                 pDest->ppMatrix[y][x]=(UINT8)(p*255.0);
00301                         }
00302                 }
00303 #ifdef IPL_ADD_HISTORY
00304                 /* end history appending (remove a leading '\t' character) */
00305                 k_IplStopHistoryMacro();
00306 #endif
00307                 return true;
00308         } 
00309 }
00310

00312 bool k_NonlinearCopyIntToByte(TIntImage *pSource,float gamma,
00313                                                           int Min,int Max, TImage *pDest)
00314 {
00315         if ((pSource->Origin==EMPTY) || (Max<=Min) || (gamma<0))
00316         {
00317                 TString str;
00318                 k_InitString(&str);
00319                 k_AddFileAndLine(str);
00320                 k_ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,&str,"k_NonLinearCopyIntToByte(). Source image is empty or wrong"
00321                         " input data: gamma= %f, Min = %d, Max = %d", gamma, Min,Max);
00322                 k_EmptyString(&str);
00323                 return false;
00324         }
00325         else
00326         { 
00327                 unsigned int x,y,w,h;
00328                 double p,q,den,logden;
00329                 den=Max-Min;
00330                 logden=log(den+1);
00331                 h=pSource->Height;
00332                 w=pSource->Width;
00333                 if ((pDest->Width!=w) || (pDest->Height!=h) || (pDest->Bits!=8))
00334                 {
00335                         k_AllocImage(w,h,8,pDest);
00336                 }    
00337 #ifdef IPL_ADD_HISTORY
00338                 /* empty old history from destination in all cases */
00339                 k_EmptyText(&(pDest->History));
00340                 /* copy history before adding comment */
00341                 k_CopyText(&(pDest->History),&(pSource->History));
00342                 /* add comment to history */
00343                 {
00344                         TString History;
00345                         k_InitString(&History);
00346                         k_SprintfString(&History,"%sk_NonLinearIntToByte() gamma=%f, Min=%d, Max=%d",
00347                                 ipl_HistoryIndent,gamma,Min,Max);
00348                         k_AppendTextIPL(&(pDest->History),History.pChars);
00349                         k_EmptyString(&History);
00350                         k_IplStartHistoryMacro();
00351                 }
00352 #endif
00353                 for (y=0;y<h;y++)
00354                 {
00355                         for (x=0;x<w;x++) 
00356                         {
00357                                 q=(float)pSource->ppMatrix[y][x];
00358                                 if (q<=Min)
00359                                         p=0; 
00360                                 else
00361                                 {
00362                                         if (gamma==(float)1)
00363                                                 p=(q-Min)/den;
00364                                         else if (gamma==(float)0)
00365                                                 p=log(q-Min+1)/logden; 
00366                                         else
00367                                                 p=pow((double)(q-Min)/den,(double)gamma);
00368                                         if (p>1)
00369                                                 p=1;
00370                                 }
00371                                 pDest->ppMatrix[y][x]=(UINT8)(p*255.0);
00372                         }
00373                 }
00374 #ifdef IPL_ADD_HISTORY
00375                 /* end history appending (remove a leading '\t' character) */
00376                 k_IplStopHistoryMacro();
00377 #endif
00378                 return true;
00379         } 
00380 }

00382 bool k_NonlinearCopyFloatToByte(TFloatImage* pSource ,float gamma,
00383                                                                 float Min, float Max, TImage *pDest)
00384 {
00385         if ((pSource->Origin==EMPTY) && (Max<=Min) && (gamma<0))
00386         {
00387                 TString str;
00388                 k_InitString(&str);
00389                 k_AddFileAndLine(str);
00390                 k_ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,&str,"k_NonLinearCopyFloatToByte(). Source image is empty or wrong"
00391                         " input data: gamma= %f, Min = %f, Max = %f", gamma, Min,Max);
00392                 k_EmptyString(&str);
00393                 return false;
00394         }
00395         else
00396         { 
00397                 unsigned int w,h,x,y;
00398                 double p,q,den,logden;
00399                 den=Max-Min;
00400                 logden=log(den+1);
00401                 h=pSource->Height;
00402                 w=pSource->Width;
00403                 if ((pDest->Width!=w) || (pDest->Height!=h) || (pDest->Bits!=8))
00404                 {
00405                         k_AllocImage(w,h,8,pDest);
00406                 }    
00407 #ifdef IPL_ADD_HISTORY
00408                 /* empty old history from destination in all cases */
00409                 k_EmptyText(&(pDest->History));
00410                 /* copy history before adding comment */
00411                 k_CopyText(&(pDest->History),&(pSource->History));
00412                 /* add comment to history */
00413                 {
00414                         TString History;
00415                         k_InitString(&History);
00416                         k_SprintfString(&History,"%sk_NonLinearCopyFloatToByte() gamma=%f, Min=%f, Max=%f",
00417                                 ipl_HistoryIndent,gamma,Min,Max);
00418                         k_AppendTextIPL(&(pDest->History),History.pChars);
00419                         k_EmptyString(&History);
00420                         k_IplStartHistoryMacro();
00421                 }
00422 #endif
00423                 for (y=0;y<h;y++)
00424                 {
00425                         for (x=0;x<w;x++) 
00426                         { 
00427                                 q=pSource->ppMatrix[y][x];
00428                                 if (q<=Min)
00429                                         p=0; 
00430                                 else
00431                                 {
00432                                         if (gamma==(float)1)
00433                                                 p=(q-Min)/den;
00434                                         else if (gamma==(float)0)
00435                                                 p=log(q-Min+1)/logden; 
00436                                         else
00437                                                 p=pow((double)(q-Min)/den,(double)gamma);
00438                                         if (p>1)
00439                                                 p=1;
00440                                 }
00441                                 pDest->ppMatrix[y][x]=(UINT8)(p*255.0);
00442                         }
00443                 }
00444 #ifdef IPL_ADD_HISTORY
00445                 /* end history appending (remove a leading '\t' character) */
00446                 k_IplStopHistoryMacro();
00447 #endif
00448                 return true;
00449         }
00450 }
00451 
00452 bool k_NonlinearCopyComplexToByte(TComplexImage *pSource,COMPLEXCHOISE mode,FLOAT32 gamma,
00453                                                                   float Min, float Max, TImage *pDest)
00454 {
00455         if ((pSource->Origin==EMPTY) || (Max<=Min) || (gamma<0))
00456         {
00457                 TString str;
00458                 k_InitString(&str);
00459                 k_AddFileAndLine(str);
00460                 k_ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,&str,"k_NonLinearComplexToByte(). Source image is empty or wrong"
00461                         " input data: gamma= %f, Min = %f, Max = %f", gamma, Min,Max);
00462                 k_EmptyString(&str);
00463                 return false;
00464         }
00465         else
00466         { 
00467                 int x,y;
00468                 unsigned int w,h;
00469                 double p,q,den,logden,re,im;
00470                 den=Max-Min;
00471                 logden=log(den+1);
00472                 h=pSource->Height;
00473                 w=pSource->Width;
00474                 if ((pDest->Width!=w) || (pDest->Height!=h) || (pDest->Bits!=8))
00475                 {
00476                         k_AllocImage(w,h,8,pDest);
00477                 }    
00478 #ifdef IPL_ADD_HISTORY
00479                 /* empty old history from destination in all cases */
00480                 k_EmptyText(&(pDest->History));
00481                 /* copy history before adding comment */
00482                 k_CopyText(&(pDest->History),&(pSource->History));
00483                 /* add comment to history */
00484                 {
00485                         TString History;
00486                         k_InitString(&History);
00487                         k_SprintfString(&History,"%sk_NonLinearCopyComplexToByte() gamma=%f, Min=%f, Max=%f",
00488                                 ipl_HistoryIndent,gamma,Min,Max);
00489                         k_AppendTextIPL(&(pDest->History),History.pChars);
00490                         k_EmptyString(&History);
00491                         k_IplStartHistoryMacro();
00492                 }
00493 #endif
00494                 for (y=kC_GetMinY(pSource);y<kC_GetMaxY(pSource);y++)
00495                 {
00496                         for (x=kC_GetMinX(pSource);x<kC_GetMaxX(pSource);x++) 
00497                         { 
00498                                 re=pSource->ppMatrixRe[y][x];
00499                                 im=pSource->ppMatrixIm[y][x];
00500                                 if (mode==COMPLEX_REAL)
00501                                         q=re; 
00502                                 else
00503                                         if (mode==COMPLEX_IMAGINARY)
00504                                                 q=im; 
00505                                         else 
00506                                                 q=sqrt(re*re+im*im);
00507                                         if (q<=Min)
00508                                                 p=0; 
00509                                         else /* assumes COMPLEX_MODULUS */
00510                                         {
00511                                                 if (gamma==(float)1)
00512                                                         p=(q-Min)/den;
00513                                                 else if (gamma==(float)0)
00514                                                         p=log(q-Min+1)/logden; 
00515                                                 else
00516                                                         p=pow((double)(q-Min)/den,(double)gamma);
00517                                                 if (p>1)
00518                                                         p=1;
00519                                         }
00520                                         pDest->ppMatrix[y][x]=(UINT8)(p*255.0);
00521                         }
00522                 }
00523 #ifdef IPL_ADD_HISTORY
00524                 /* end history appending (remove a leading '\t' character) */
00525                 k_IplStopHistoryMacro();
00526 #endif
00527                 return true;
00528         }
00529 }
